local_intent: Compute pinch grasp pose for grape and verify the grasp key is available
assumptions: Target grape has been detected and approach/alignment already completed
Gripper is open and ready for grasp planning
coherence_with_global: Matches the global segment: ComputeGraspPose('grape','pinch' -> 'grasp_grape') followed by PoseAvailable('grasp_grape') prior to contact and closing.
